eventlist.description: The moon is full! Beware, lycanthropic creatures like werewolves, werefoxes or werebears roam the lands now. And they are more aggressive and numerous than usual.
eventlist.name: Full Moon

eventlist.description: Gain experience 2x faster when defeating monsters.
eventlist.name: Double Exp

eventlist.description: Train your skills 2x faster in all training modalities.
eventlist.name: Double Skills

eventlist.description: It\'s forging day! All players will have a +20% success bonus for adding Tiers to items.
eventlist.name: Forge Bonus

eventlist.description: Spawn Rate Event! Monsters respawn at a faster rate.
eventlist.name: Rapid Respawn

eventlist.description: It\'s hunting day! All monsters will give 2x more bestiary points when defeated.
eventlist.name: Double Bestiary

eventlist.description: It\'s hunting day! All bosses will give 2x more bosstiary points when defeated.
eventlist.name: Double Bosstiary
